title: Analyze Haul Truck Oil Sample
description: A technician takes an oil sample from a haul truck's engine. The sample is sent to a lab to check for wear metals that could indicate an engine problem.

tasks.description: Create a request in the system for an oil sample to be taken from truck HT-51's engine.
tasks.expected_outcome: A work order for the sample collection is generated.

tasks.description: Receive the analysis results from the lab.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lab report is received electronically and attached to the equipment record in the CMMS.

tasks.description: Analyze the results, which show high levels of iron and copper. Flag the engine for an internal inspection at the next service.
tasks.expected_outcome: The abnormal result is identified, and a follow-up inspection is planned to investigate the source of the wear.
